english_example_sentence: By not lifting the fragile glass vase, she protected it from breaking
russian_example_sentence: Не поднимая хрупкую стеклянную вазу, она защитила её от разбивания
turkish_example_sentence: Kırılgan cam vazoyu kaldırmayarak, genç kız onu kırılmaktan korudu
